You are visiting my personal blog, so here is a little bit of information about me and my research interests:

I am passionate about learning and exploring new ideas in the fields of Data Science, Psychometrics, Data Analytics, and Educational Assessment.

Currently, I work on my PhD in Educational Assessment and Evaluation. My current research interest is on Automated Essay Scoring, which has led me through machine learning and natural language processing.

Always feel free to contact me about any feedback, questions, or maybe just to say "hi".
:::
